columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the instance.

columns.name: blueprint_id
columns.description: The blueprint ID (e.g., os_amlinux_2016_03).

columns.name: blueprint_name
columns.description: The friendly name of the blueprint (e.g., Amazon Linux).

columns.name: bundle_id
columns.description: The bundle for the instance (e.g., micro_1_0).

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp when the instance was created.

columns.name: hardware
columns.description: The size of the vCPU and the amount of RAM for the instance.

columns.name: ip_address_type
columns.description: The IP address type of the instance.

columns.name: ip_v6_addresses
columns.description: The IPv6 addresses of the instance.

columns.name: is_static_ip
columns.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this instance has a static IP assigned to it.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone where the instance is located.

columns.name: metadata_options
columns.description: The metadata options for the Amazon Lightsail instance.

columns.name: networking
columns.description: Information about the public ports and monthly data transfer rates for the instance.

columns.name: private_ip_address
columns.description: The private IP address of the instance.

columns.name: public_ip_address
columns.description: The public IP address of the instance.

columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The type of resource.

columns.name: ssh_key_name
columns.description: The name of the SSH key being used to connect to the instance.

columns.name: state_code
columns.description: The status code for the instance.

columns.name: state_name
columns.description: The status of the instance.

columns.name: support_code
columns.description: The support code.

columns.name: username
columns.description: The user name for connecting to the instance.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the instance.
